TopicTitle: Karbonite drill won't give me the option to drill for ore.

Articles.Content:
(The only relevant mods I have are Karbonite, ScanSAT, and EPL, nothing else should touch the Regolith stuff)

I landed a drill on the surface on Minmus where there is definitely ore to mine, but for some reason the Karbonite drill, which is the drill I've used to mine ore loads of times before, isn't working for some reason.

![OSB1LsN.png](http://i.imgur.com/OSB1LsN.png)

I have the option to drill Karbonite, but not ore. I have the [Extraplanetary Launchpads plugin thing](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89774-90-%28V-30%29-ExtraPlanetary-Launchpads%28EPL%29-Regolith-Adaptation-%282-4-15%29), so it should work, and I know it works because I've done it before in the past.

I made a thing out of all of the drill parts I have (other than the oceanic ones) and only the auger gives me the option to mine for ore.

![qyWIPtC.png](http://i.imgur.com/qyWIPtC.png)

Why did it suddenly stop working? D: Is there a way I can fix it?
As far as I know it was changed in some recent patch, I've never had the option, I just use the MKS Drills
yep use the mks drills mks adds ore karbonite only adds karbonite
